original_title: BABYMETAL - The Five Fox Festival in Japan - Gold Fox Festival
overview: Babymetal's third show in their Five Fox Festival in Japan tour brings their unique blend of heavy metal, dance, and idol music to Akasaka Blitz in Minato, Tokyo. This July 20, 2017 special fan event limited attendance to just teenagers.
tagline: The breath of fresh air of the Golden Foxes who have traveled from El Doradoâ€¦
title: BABYMETAL - The Five Fox Festival in Japan - Gold Fox Festival
